oi.summery: OI (Osteogenesis imperfecta) aka brittle bone disease is a genetic defect that manly effects the bone structure causing bones to fracture more easily.
oi.types: There are currently 19 recognized types of OI named I (1) to XIX (19). Several types are distinguished by their signs and symptoms, although their characteristic features overlap. Increasingly, genetic causes are used to define rarer forms of OI.
